# OptionExtensions.TapSome&lt;T&gt; method

Executes a side effect if *option* is Some, and returns *option* unchanged.

```csharp
public static Option<T> TapSome<T>(this Option<T> option, Action<T> ifSome)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | A Some type. |
| option | An Option |
| ifSome | An Action to execute if *option* is Some. |

## Return Value

*option*
